encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Vote - Accept-Text-Meta - Fine. L. 1: repeat reg for ἁγεία on the same line twice. L. 4: in the edition also alternative of καταμαρτυρεῖ given. l. 6-7: reg tag only for the first word. The edition has then τρόπ̣ο[υ]. From the online image I would remove the underdot. L. 8: add reg for μὴν - μὴ. The text in the edition does not have the supplemented lacuna in το[ῦ], but it is right according to the image: PN correction? l. 9: Diaeresis on the other side of reg. ἁ[γίων] to underdot ἁ̣[γίων]. L. 11: in text τακρέω only. L. 12: split the regularized form also δύναμιν into the two lines. L. 13: ὥ{σ}σα remove the parenthesis. L. 14: I didn't understand where the <καὶ> comes from. The edition has: ἐποιή̣σα-μεν and Preisendanz: ἐποιή̣σ̣ε̣. | μετανασστηνάσον. L. 15: δια{πε}πέποθα delete parenthesis. L. 18: <:<μὴ> με=Preisedanz|ed|<:μή|reg|μὲ:>:> ; ἀμελήσ[η̣]ι̣ς in the edition. L. 19: κύριο{ς}ς remove parenthesis and add reg tag. L. 20: ca.3 > κ[αὶ] according to the edition. L. 22: τοὺς{ς} remove parenthesis and add reg tag. L. 23: ἀμὴν was ἀ[μὴν] in the edition but from the image I would underdot the letters. L. 27: [.4]σ[.3]ρεωσ[.6]; L. 28: [.9]ν.4ν̣ος

Vote - Accept-Text-Meta - Fine. L. 1: repeat reg for ἁγεία on the same line twice. L. 4: in the edition also alternative of καταμαρτυρεῖ given. l. 6-7: reg tag only for the first word. The edition has then τρόπ̣ο[υ]. From the online image I would remove the underdot. L. 8: add reg for μὴν - μὴ. The text in the edition does not have the supplemented lacuna in το[ῦ], but it is right according to the image: PN correction? l. 9: Diaeresis on the other side of reg. ἁ[γίων] to underdot ἁ̣[γίων]. L. 11: in text τακρέω only. L. 12: split the regularized form also δύναμιν into the two lines. L. 13: ὥ{σ}σα remove the parenthesis. L. 14: I didn't understand where the <καὶ> comes from. The edition has: ἐποιή̣σα-μεν and Preisendanz: ἐποιή̣σ̣ε̣. | μετανασστηνάσον. L. 15: δια{πε}πέποθα delete parenthesis. L. 18: <:<μὴ> με=Preisedanz|ed|<:μή|reg|μὲ:>:> ; ἀμελήσ[η̣]ι̣ς in the edition. L. 19: κύριο{ς}ς remove parenthesis and add reg tag. L. 20: ca.3 > κ[αὶ] according to the edition. L. 22: τοὺς{ς} remove parenthesis and add reg tag. L. 23: ἀμὴν was ἀ[μὴν] in the edition but from the image I would underdot the letters. L. 27: [.4]σ[.3]ρεωσ[.6]; L. 28: [.9]ν.4ν̣ος

bibl.title: Greek Amulets and Formularies from Egypt Containing Christian Elements: A Checklist of Papyri, Parchments, Ostraka, and Tablets. Avec résumé en anglais.
